amendment.description: Amendment requires Amtrak to establish an outreach program to increase the number of domestic trackwork manufactureres that are awarded Amtrak contracts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment preprinted in the Congressional Record of November 28 as amendment No. 1, to require Amtrak to establish an outreach program to increase the number of domestic trackwork manufacturers that are awarded Amtrak contracts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
